ygData.subject: Re: Crude Stein
ygData.msgSnippet: ... No, ye kin only hold tha Crude Stien in yer off-hand.  As of right now, ye kin only hold tha Glowing Stien in yer off-hand also.  Until tha supposed patch
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Reuben Aguilar" <reuben@...>
>
>Ok Next question.. (thanks for the help btw)
>
>The Crude Stein has a decent bonus ratio also.. So I was wondering how does
>one get this ? is this like the glowing stein that it takes a certain race
>or so to do it ? .. I will finish the glowing stein tonight, but I want to
>complete the Crude Stein soon also.. Is it possible to equip a stein in
>both
>hands ? Like the crude stein in one and the glowing stein in the other ? ..
>thats my goal.. but non the less.. id like em both still..
>
>Thanks
>
>Nate Spiritsummoner
>Rodcet Nife Server

No, ye kin only hold tha Crude Stien in yer off-hand. As of right now, ye
kin only hold tha Glowing Stien in yer off-hand also. Until tha supposed
patch ta make tha Glowin' Stien a primary hand weapon is implemented, ye
will not be able ta 2-fist yer Stiens. Also, tha last Ah checked, tha
Glowin' Stien displayed as a Lantern when ye held it. Anyboady know if this
has been fixed yet?

Lincus
